blog.description: ! DON'T REPOST MY STUFF ! Welcome to my blog! If you're looking for fluffy Drarry stuff (or anything Drarry related) you came to the right place. Check out my fics at AO3: https://archiveofourown.org/users/gnarf/pseuds/gnarf or search here for the tag 'my writing'. All the love and credit for the beautiful header and avatar goes to alek-r: http://alek-r.tumblr.com, thank you so much for allowing me to use your beautiful art!

summary: Safe (with you) - gnarf - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
title: Safe (with you) - gnarf - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
After the war Draco’s life was mostly quiet for a long while, until the day he started to write.
His books quickly became popular because they showed the other side of the war, the dark side, the side of the ones that lost and how it was to live between them.

But not everyone was happy with him telling this side of the story. Shortly after he announced his third and final book he started to receive death threats. Draco didn’t really care about them,they weren’t his first ones and probably not the last either.

Everything changed after someone attacked him at a Ministry function and he found himself locked up with Potter as his safeguard in a tiny hut in the middle of nowhere.

_________

Thank you @maesterchill for your help with the beta! 💜 It was great fun working with you 😁

summary:
Hermione: Holy shit!
Hermione: Are you okay?
Harry: yeah I am good.
Hermione: Are you sure? How are you still alive!
Harry:...
body:
Hermione: Holy shit!

Hermione: Are you okay?

Harry: yeah I am good.

Hermione: Are you sure? How are you still alive!

Harry: Honestly I have been asking myself that for years.

reblog.comment:
Hermione: Holy shit!

Hermione: Are you okay?

Harry: yeah I am good.

Hermione: Are you sure? How are you still alive!

Harry: Honestly I have been asking myself that for years.

trail.content_raw:
Hermione: Holy shit!

Hermione: Are you okay?

Harry: yeah I am good.

Hermione: Are you sure? How are you still alive!

Harry: Honestly I have been asking myself that for years.
trail.content:
Hermione: Holy shit!

Hermione: Are you okay?

Harry: yeah I am good.

Hermione: Are you sure? How are you still alive!

Harry: Honestly I have been asking myself that for years.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary:
Gods & Monsters
 Potterverse | 1950 | Riddle Era | 1 yr.

 G&M is currently celebrating one-year of being open to the public! ...
caption:
Gods & Monsters

Potterverse | 1950 | Riddle Era | 1 yr.

G&M is currently celebrating one-year of being open to the public!  We are a friendly, active community with lots to offer to our members including but not limited to a plot that is shaping the world of their characters. We have lots of character based plots, subplots, and more as well! If you’re unsure where to begin, take a peek at the character requests and the subplots!

We hope to see you there!

Home - Plot - Canon List - Requests

tags: dunno why this popped into my head
summary: Okay y'all can't tell me there wasn't one time Remus got a little carried away during sex and bit Sirius (who's into it...
body: Okay y'all can’t tell me there wasn’t one time Remus got a little carried away during sex and bit Sirius (who’s into it actually) but then Remus proceeded to have a panic attack because even though it’s not a full moon and he knew Sirius was fine, that had felt like the wolf and it terrified him.
